title: Is Biotech worth it in PES?
content:
I'm planning on doing masters in Biotech in the future in either US or Europe and wondering if PES will be able to give me the opportunities I will need. Also how are the internships for bioinformatics side from PES? 

Is there any placement information available for Biotech?

comments.body: Biotech in India is worth it nearly nowhere in India
OP wants to do MS. They're probably asking how higher education opportunities are
You will have to look for internships during the summer/8th sem on your own. As far as i know there are no placements but you can always check with the HOD
